title: Emerald Radiance: Three-Layered Emerald and Diamond Haaram
materials: G Color). Hyderabadi Kundan setting with intricate detailing.
features: This exquisite three-layered Haaram features a mesmerizing pattern of square-cut emeralds interspersed with delicate floral motifs completely paved with diamonds. The emeralds are bezel set while the diamonds are placed in a pave setting style, enhancing their brilliance and creating a harmonious balance between color and sparkle. The reverse of the piece shows traditional meenakari work showcasing meticulous attention to detail.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable as a statement piece for high-profile events and formal gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and exceptional craftsmanship. The combination of emeralds and diamonds signifies prosperity, love, and commitment. The multi-layered design offers versatility, allowing it to be worn as a single-strand necklace or a show-stopping three-layer statement piece. The piece showcases Hyderabadi craftsmanship and embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry.
